nl.esciencecenter.neon.math.Float4Vector

  • Packages that use Float4Vector 
    Package Description
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.math
    The matrix/vector math library needed for OpenGL 3.0+ functionality.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.models.graphs
    Several ready-to-apply generic graph models.

      Constructors in nl.esciencecenter.neon.math with parameters of type Float4Vector 
      Constructor and Description
      Color4(Float4Vector v)
      Stand-in for a vector, in which the places represent R, G, B and A values.
      Float4Matrix(Float4Vector v0, Float4Vector v1, Float4Vector v2, Float4Vector v3)
      Creates a new matrix, using the vectors in order as filling.
      Float4Vector(Float4Vector v)
      Creates a new vector by copying the given vector.
      Point4(Float4Vector v)
      Stand-in for a 4-place vector, where the fourth place is always 1f.
